RemediationStrings.Title: Operating System volumes encryption status
RemediationStrings.Description: The Operating System volumes are not completely encrypted. Please verify the status of the Operating System volumes

RemediationStrings.Title: Non encrypted Operating System volumes list
RemediationStrings.Description: The following Operating System Volumes are not completely encrypted: {ActualValue}.

RemediationStrings.Title: Data volumes encryption status
RemediationStrings.Description: The Data volumes are not completely encrypted. Please verify the status of the Data volumes

RemediationStrings.Title: Non encrypted Data volumes list
RemediationStrings.Description: The following Data volumes are not completely encrypted: {ActualValue}.
